_description: Life of St. Martha, in the Scottish Legendary

CULGg26.First Lines:
Þhat tyme cristis hoste marthaour al þe world cane
                    prechand ga…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…& þat mony mene has seneful redly with fleschly
                    ene
CULGg26.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Barbours des schottischen Nationaldichters Legendensammlung.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 1.137-42.
Metcalfe,  William Musham,
                        ed.  
             Legends of the Saints, in the Scottish dialect of the fourteenth
                century….
             6 pts. in 3 vols. 
             Scottish Text Society
         13, 18, 23, 25, 35, 37. Edinburgh, London: Blackwood, 1896: 1.285-95.
